content: Roberto Beraldi | Dipartimento di Ingegneria informatica, automatica e gestionale Salta al contenuto principale Home » Users » Roberto Beraldi Roberto Beraldi Professore associatostanza: B208telefono: +39 0677274018email uniroma1: roberto.beraldi@uniroma1.it Biografia Roberto Beraldi joined the DIAG department in 2002. He is member of the MIDLAB research group and of the Cyber Intelligence and Information Security Research center, CIS.His research is focused on distributes systems and wireless mobile systems.
